reviews.review:
[h1]Portal 2[/h1]

[b] OCENA OGÓLNA [/b]

Portal 2 to sequel gry Portal; został wydany w 2012 roku przez firmę Valve... Bla, bla, bla...
Wcielamy się tutaj w Chell, bohaterkę z pierwszej części. Znów walczymy z bezdusznym systemem, GLaDOS. Tym razem pomaga nam Wheatly, wcielenie głupoty i debilizmu. Grę naprawdę bardzo przyjemnie się przechodzi, czasem trzeba troszkę pogłówkować, gdzie tu ustawić portal, ale po jakimś czasie każdy poziom się przejdzie. 
Muzyka wspaniale oddaje klimat akcji. Można tu usłyszeć wszystko, co się rusza, spadające radio, tupiącą "grubą" Chell, śmiejącego się diabolicznie Wheatly'ego... Żyć nie umierać!
Gra została (jak na razie) najlepiej ocenioną grą na Steam przez Metacritic (95/100). Według mnie jest dobra, ale może z nią konkurować wiele gier.
Najmocniejszym argumentem jest oryginalność gry. Nie znam innej podobnej serii gier. Mimo że jesteśmy uzbrojeni tylko w Portal Gun, to i tak możemy z nim zdziałać wszystko. I właśnie tego gratuluję Valve: przy zaledwie jednym urządzeniu, jednej broni, zrobiliście masę różnych interakcji z nią związanych.

[b] OCENA CZĄSTKOWA [/b]

[h1]OCENA KOŃCOWA: 91,2/100[/h1]

Satisfying puzzles and wit for days. This game is great.

If you love Puzzle, action, great storys, fun Co-op and cake this is the game for you.

Storyline of this game is really good. Puzzles are sometimes pretty easy but i found out couble of puzzles hard and annoying. i ragequited many times because i couldn't able to solve the puzzle.

10/10 Uno de los mejores juegos. GlaDOS, me encanta su humor sarcástico.
Nice story, perfect game!
great game to play with a friend! Definitely worth trying out.  Best puzzle game ever!!!

This is probably one of the best sequels for a game ever, although it's much like portal, it improves on what was broken, while adding in new stuff including steam workshop support, in fact a lot of the community test chambers are better than the singleplayer and multiplayer chambers, which leads me to a feature that executed amazingly, the multiplayer, it takes place after the singleplayer campaign and you and one of your friends can complete tests together, the co-op chambers cleverly make it so that both players must work together to go from point a to point b (with the use of the portal gun of course).

Then there's the amazing singleplayer campaign, it starts off where the first game left off (a little bit, it makes more sense if you read the lab rat comic that came out a year after)
where chell, the main character, is waken up by the quirky robot Wheatly (voiced Beautifully by Stephen Merchant from 'the office' and 'an idiot abroad') and must go through the test chambers to escape Aperture Science.

I could go on about this game, but I won't, the best way to see how good this game is, is by buying and playing it. so do it, like, right now
Solve all your problems! With Portals! Awesome Puzzle game with awesome Story!
space!!!
norm
Çok güzel helede co op yapınca

As I expected, I was incredibly impressed by Portal 2. It takes the original game and expands it even further by adding in more sophisticated puzzles, new strategies to discover, and it even manages to give GlaDoS a backstory. I had only played bits of the game before buying it recently, and I can tell you that the plot and gameplay goes to places you would not expect. This game is absolutely a must-own for every gamer, and it might be one of the best games I have ever played.
Game is fun. Even without discount, i would buy it again. Hope there will be next sequel

Эта игра просто шикарна, по моему мнению с ней может сравниться только Assassin’s Creed IV Black Flag(естественно в плане сюжета). Сюжет в игре просто берёт за душу, эти побеги от GLaDOS и Wheatley, предательства и многое другое. 
Персонаже очень эмоциональны и иногда даже ранимы. Особенно турельки. люблю турельки:3.
В плане геймплея тут Valve тоже не прогодали, всё просто замечально. 
Конечно, задроты которые играют только в Dota и CS скажут: <<ЧТО!? Portal2, ещё одно говно от Valve? Зачем нужно делать такую херню, если можно сделать аркану на Axe'а или ПП-Бизон Азимов или Вулкан? Нахрена нам ваши Portal'ы или Left 4 Dead'ы, лучше CS'ку запилилибы новую или в Dota'е карту новую! я не знаю зачем им это делать!? Одни головоломки да камеры!>>.
Саундтреки на высоте. Лучше тем в Portal'е я таких саундтреков не слышал.
В обшем ставлю этой игре 11 турелик из 10 турелик:3

Seriously. I can't say enough about this game. If you haven't played the original or this one, just jump on it. IT WILL SURPRISE YOU. It did for me initially. I thought it was just going to be another FPS which I have never been a huge fan of. But I have been so glued to the Portal series since I first tried it. It is just THAT amazing. And it's a -PUZZLE- game for all intents and purposes. *brainsplode*. If you have to, grab it on a sale! It's often on sale under $5. Skip a latte! You won't be displeased!

I'm just adding to the massive pile of positive reviews for this game - buy it. An amazing single player experience. I have yet to tap into co-op but can't wait to do so. The ~8 hour single player campaign is more than worth the price, on sale or not.
Quite possibly the greatest game the world has ever seen.  This game restored my faith in humanity.  I once again feel comforable bringing children into the world.

I really Enjoy this game. It is fun trying to figure out what to do and it is fun to play with my friend. We get a laugh out of playing this.

Deja de ver las puntuaciones postivas del juego y compralo ya! es de los juegos mejores puntuados de steam y se lo merece de preferencia compra el primer juego tambien, no se lo unico malo que he encontrado es que ningun amigo mio tiene este juego (y luego resulta ue todos ya lo jugaron XD) pero podre buscar amigos despues y deja de leer esto y ponlo en tu carrito!!

It's Portal.  I'm not gonna go into detail, but in terms of fun, detail, quality, great story, and all around fun-ness Portal 2 is hand down my favorite game of all time.  Yes Skyrim, TF2, Half Life, Civilization, and other games are all great and I enjoy them, but nothing beats the sheer sincere fun of Portal.  It's just so well made with such high quality and attention to detail, if you haven't bought it I highly recommend picking it up next time its on sale, it is definitly worth it.
Good.

A funny and interesting story mixed with amazing and interesting gameplay mechanics.  My only regret was not playing Portal 1 first- not because I didn't understand the story- but because I know I would of appreciated the plot even more.  Amazing game. 10/10
Awesome game for anyone Great storyline!
Tiene muy buenos gráficos y esta mucho mejor que el primero, aunque el primero también me gustó, éste se ve mucho mejor. Lo recomiendo totalmente, sobre todo si te gustó el primer juego.

This was a really smart, interesting and clever plot game. I thought overall Portal was a good game, but it needed more of a story-line and less repetitive test chambers. Which is exactly what portal 2 did. I personally enjoy for gameplay and story-line Portal 2 over Half-Life 2. I'd say Portal 2 is in my top 5 favourite games of all time.

If you haven't played this game yet, you haven't played the most fun and challenging first-person puzzle game ever. This game has a mixture of humor and intelligence. As both the singleplayer mode and co-op are a blast to play, the story of this game is a great sequel to its predecessor. Experiencing the story of revenge in singleplayer and the power of teamwork and friendship in co-op shows me that this game is the true test to see your intelligence level. Playing this with friends has been a blast and the custom levels made by the community just add to the fun. A must-buy if you're looking for a game to increase your intelligence level.

Edit: Still an amazing game with its custom-made player courses!
Its good

Bad. Really bad.
Since release, gamers always pretend to love this 'game' and make overrated memes which I'm sick to death of.
"Companion cube", the "John Cave", the cake, GLaDOS and Aperture Labs references and memes are everywhere.
In my school, in reddit, in every game mods. Hell, even I only find re tards forcing you to buy this game in the negative reviews section. 
I just don't like this game. I don't get it why it's pretending to be funny, the jokes are just not funny.

Pros:
Puzzles
Workshop support

Cons:
Bad humor. The game tries its best to be funny but it's just isn't. I have no idea how people laugh at these ''jokes'' just YIKES.
Bad storyline
Toxic fanbase


If you want games like this but with action, good story, with a side of puzzles, try Half-Life series, this is pure garbage.

Easily ranks in the list of best games I've ever played. if you like science, robots, portals, space (I like space....), combustile lemons, potatoes, mantis men, and much much more, than this is your game. The game has an awesome and fun multi player, and a great map maker. I'd say its not only funny, but it makes you think, and not many games can say that. The only flaw is that you only play the story once and you don't really return ever, but that's something that would be hard to fix as many games have that problem, and it still has plenty of other features. You should absolutely buy this game as well as portal 1. It ranks up there with team fortress 2, left 4 dead 2, Assassin's Creed II (ironically a lot of 2's), Garry's Mod, Minecraft, Dont Starve, and Faster than light. All good games you should get.

10/10
fantastic level design, funny charecters, difficult but still fun. I love this game, its one of the best games ever made, probably 2x better than portal and that was a great game!

This is  one of the very very few games that I cant seem to stop playing. I think I've probably played through the game several times now, and I love it every time. The level design, challenge design, writing, voice acting, etc is all extremely well done. Valve please dont let this be another game that never sees a third, like the others!
